FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='selection_menu',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='grille_chargee',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='grille_chargee',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='selection_menu',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='option',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='option',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        If(
          cond=
            UnaryOp(
              op='!',
              expr=
                ID(
                  name='grille_chargee',
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"******************************************************************************\\n\\n                             MENU LABYRINTHE\\n\\n******************************************************************************\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"1- Charger un labyrinthe\\n2- [INDISPONIBLE] Resoudre le labyrinthe\\n3- [INDISPONIBLE] Resoudre le labyrinthe pas-a-pas\\n4- Quitter le programme\\n\\n>"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[2]=
                DoWhile(
                  cond=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='&&',
                      left=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='!=',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='option',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='!=',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='option',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='4',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  stmt=
                    Compound(
                      block_items[0]=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='scanf',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                Constant(
                                  type='string',
                                  value='"%i"',
                                )
                              exprs[1]=
                                UnaryOp(
                                  op='&',
                                  expr=
                                    ID(
                                      name='option',
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      block_items[1]=
                        If(
                          cond=
                            BinaryOp(
                              op='||',
                              left=
                                BinaryOp(
                                  op='||',
                                  left=
                                    BinaryOp(
                                      op='||',
                                      left=
                                        BinaryOp(
                                          op='==',
                                          left=
                                            ID(
                                              name='option',
                                            )
                                          right=
                                            Constant(
                                              type='int',
                                              value='2',
                                            )
                                        )
                                      right=
                                        BinaryOp(
                                          op='==',
                                          left=
                                            ID(
                                              name='option',
                                            )
                                          right=
                                            Constant(
                                              type='int',
                                              value='3',
                                            )
                                        )
                                    )
                                  right=
                                    BinaryOp(
                                      op='<',
                                      left=
                                        ID(
                                          name='option',
                                        )
                                      right=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                              right=
                                BinaryOp(
                                  op='>',
                                  left=
                                    ID(
                                      name='option',
                                    )
                                  right=
                                    Constant(
                                      type='int',
                                      value='4',
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                          iftrue=
                            Compound(
                              block_items[0]=
                                FuncCall(
                                  name=
                                    ID(
                                      name='printf',
                                    )
                                  args=
                                    ExprList(
                                      exprs[0]=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='string',
                                          value='"Choix invalide !\\n"',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          iffalse=
            If(
              cond=
                ID(
                  name='grille_chargee',
                )
              iftrue=
                Compound(
                  block_items[0]=
                    FuncCall(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='printf',
                        )
                      args=
                        ExprList(
                          exprs[0]=
                            Constant(
                              type='string',
                              value='"******************************************************************************\\n\\n                             MENU LABYRINTHE\\n\\n******************************************************************************\\n"',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  block_items[1]=
                    FuncCall(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='printf',
                        )
                      args=
                        ExprList(
                          exprs[0]=
                            Constant(
                              type='string',
                              value='"1- Charger un labyrinthe\\n2- Resoudre le labyrinthe\\n3- Resoudre le labyrinthe pas-a-pas\\n4- Quitter le programme\\n\\n>"',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  block_items[2]=
                    DoWhile(
                      cond=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='||',
                          left=
                            BinaryOp(
                              op='<',
                              left=
                                ID(
                                  name='option',
                                )
                              right=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='1',
                                )
                            )
                          right=
                            BinaryOp(
                              op='>',
                              left=
                                ID(
                                  name='option',
                                )
                              right=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='4',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      stmt=
                        Compound(
                          block_items[0]=
                            FuncCall(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='scanf',
                                )
                              args=
                                ExprList(
                                  exprs[0]=
                                    Constant(
                                      type='string',
                                      value='"%i"',
                                    )
                                  exprs[1]=
                                    UnaryOp(
                                      op='&',
                                      expr=
                                        ID(
                                          name='option',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                          block_items[1]=
                            If(
                              cond=
                                BinaryOp(
                                  op='||',
                                  left=
                                    BinaryOp(
                                      op='<',
                                      left=
                                        ID(
                                          name='option',
                                        )
                                      right=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                  right=
                                    BinaryOp(
                                      op='>',
                                      left=
                                        ID(
                                          name='option',
                                        )
                                      right=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='4',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                              iftrue=
                                Compound(
                                  block_items[0]=
                                    FuncCall(
                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='printf',
                                        )
                                      args=
                                        ExprList(
                                          exprs[0]=
                                            Constant(
                                              type='string',
                                              value='"Choix invalide !\\n"',
                                            )
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        Return(
          expr=
            ID(
              name='option',
            )
        )
    )
)
